name: NarcissismFactsbyCynthiaBailey-Rug
0:
”Alexa, open narcissism facts”
”Alexa, start narcissism facts”
”Alexa, ask narcissism facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: narcissism facts
des:
Do you wonder why someone in your life is incredibly selfish, not caring about hurting you or even about what is happening in your life? This person may be a narcissist.

Ask Alexa for the facts about Narcissistic Personality Disorder. When using this skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.

**This skill was created to be used for educational and informational purposes only.**
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
